title: D5 Looking for players P+ To 3v3
body:
Hey I'm FIareon, 
I'm currently just looking for players who want to get gold in 3v3, no real requirements other than being P+, add me in game (Ign Fiareon) or add me on discord Eels#9688
Play times: Around 4:30pm - 9pm (Weekdays) or 10am - 11pm (Weekends)

replies.body: Hi! Can you lower the requirement to Gold V if possible? My friends isn't interested on playing this game mode as they are focused on climbing on solo/duo. I have have tried this game mode as unranked and it does give me unfair opponents that ranks to plat or + higher.{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
Sorry bro it's pretty late at this point. I've gotten quiet a few adds but the gamemode is honestly so disheartening so I honestly don't know if I can keep playing. Gl in your future games tho
